typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Movie as string,
		Title as string,
		Genres as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{rotton tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger(Year) >= 1910 && toInteger(Year) <= 2000 && rlike(Genres, 'Comedy')

) ~> FilterYear
FilterYear aggregate(groupBy(Year),
	Rating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggregateComedyRating
AggregateComedyRating sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink
